body.p: The IASB noted that, applying the hedge accounting requirements in IFRS 9, changes to the basis for determining the contractual cash flows of a financial asset or a financial liability (seeÂ paragraphs 5.4.6–5.4.9 of IFRS 9) that are designated in a hedging relationship would affect the designation of such a hedging relationship in which an interest rate benchmark was designated as a hedged risk.
